autosolvate.autosolvate.AmberParamsBuilderÔÉÅ

class autosolvate.autosolvate.AmberParamsBuilder(xyzfile: str, name='', resname='', charge=0, spinmult=1, charge_method='resp', folder='/home/fren5/AutoSolvate-update/AutoSolvate/docs/', **kwargs)[source]ÔÉÅ

This class handles the Amber parameter creation for one single molecule. 1. Generate standard pdb 2. AnteChamber or Gaussian charge fitting 3. Tleap create Lib Others work with similar function: acpype
